title: Grounding Without Philosophy: The Vulnerability of Just-in-Time Knowledge
context: User (@plassoplo) affirms the practical power of just-in-time information retrieval (via search or AI) as a skill, but identifies a critical vulnerability shared by both search engines and LLMs.
